title: Just had to dodge because I couldn't edit my rune pages
body:
It was doing the thing where the rune editing window is hidden under other parts of the client. I wanted Hail of Blades for this particular match, but I don't already have a page with it because the _other_ bug that periodically wipes everything makes it pointless to save lots of different rune page setups. A bug that frequently wipes saved rune pages and a bug that makes it impossible to edit rune pages... that's not a good combination.

I'm not angry at you, Riot. I'm just disappointed.
